nourisher.collector.collector module¶

nourisher.collector.collector.collect_all(origUrl)[source]¶

Collects maximum informations about the feed, saves them inside database and returns ObjectID

Parameters:origUrl: original URL of the input feed

class nourisher.collector.maternalSite.Scraper(_maternalURL, _baseURL, _xpathOfInputField, browser='phantomjs')[source]¶

Bases: builtins.object

This is common interface for all scrapers, like these for Alexa.com, urlm.com, websiteoutlook.com, etc.

This class should not be called directly - there should be descendants implemented who inherits from this class.

Attributes

driver  
scrapedData  

Methods

check_unavailability(wdriver) Checks if information of scrapper are available
close_driver()
collect_textual_doubles(textWantedDouble) Collects all text from items in textWantedDouble
collect_textual_singles(textWantedSingle) Collects all text from items in textWantedSingle
collect_textual_singles_lists(...) For attributes in type key: [val1, val2, ...]
collect_that_all() Collects all possible informations - every instance must implement
selx(xpath) This is just shortage for finding text from ONE matching fields
selxs(xpath) this is just shorthand for finding text from ALL matching fields
baseURL = ''¶
check_unavailability(wdriver)[source]¶

Checks if information of scrapper are available

Parameters:

wdriver : selenium.webdriver instance

current webdriver
Returns:

bool

True if no informations are provided, else False (and hence, continue)
close_driver()[source]¶
collect_textual_doubles(textWantedDouble)[source]¶

Collects all text from items in textWantedDouble

Parameters:

textWantedDouble : dict

in format {attName : (Axpath, Bxpath)}
Returns:

dict of dicts

in format {nameOfCollection : data}, where data is in (nameOfVal, val)
collect_textual_singles(textWantedSingle)[source]¶

Collects all text from items in textWantedSingle

Parameters:

textWantedSingle : dict

dict in format {nameOfAtt1 : xpath1, nameOfAtt2:xpath2, ...}
Returns:

dict

in format {nameOfAtt1 : value1, nameOfAtt2 : value2,...}

collect_that_all()[source]¶

Collects all possible informations - every instance must implement

Parameters:maternalURL: url of maternal website of feed
Returns:dict: dictionary with data
driver = None¶
maternalURL = ''¶
scrapedData = None¶
selx(xpath)[source]¶

This is just shortage for finding text from ONE matching fields

Parameters:

xpath: string

xpath of wanted elements
Returns:

string

text from scraped value
selxs(xpath)[source]¶

this is just shorthand for finding text from ALL matching fields

Parameters:

xpath: string

xpath of wanted elements
Returns:

list of strings

list of texts from scraped values
